artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheets with the score on the recto and verso of one sheet and on the recto of the second; from fashion periodical (P.15,626) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of a man and a woman in fashionable period dress (P.15,624-P.15,625)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Quinzième Cahier, 15 Juillet 1791
